name: Last Stand (FranciscoHynt, cassioamara)
description:
You are the last hope to protect your planet's main energy source against alien invaders! 

Fight the monsters out by charging the towers with your batteries. But like all batteries, they run out of power... Figure out the best balance between charging the batteries, keeping the towers on and avoiding the monsters to hit the central structure! 

Controls:

WASD - Move

Space - Pick/Insert battery

Pitch Video (PT/BR): 

(english subtitles available)

Pitch Presentation (PT/BR PDF): https://bit.ly/3nLlwIV

I wonder what would happen if I insert two batteries at once...
